subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Seven shots behind with 11 holes to play Sunday, Ben Crane ran off seven birdies to close with a seven-under-par 63, then won a sudden-death playoff to capture the McGladrey Classic in St. Simons Island, Ga.
snippet: Seven shots behind with 11 holes to play Sunday, Ben Crane ran off seven birdies to close with a seven-under-par 63, then won a sudden-death playoff to capture the McGladrey Classic in St. Simons Island, Ga.
